excerpt: During World War I, cryptographer William Powell battles a spy ring while fending off the well-meaning chaos of his superior’s meddlesome niece, Rosalind Russell.
title: Rendezvous

excerpt: A stranger crashes a wedding to warn the groom that his bride-to-be steals, manipulates, and may have murdered a man.
title: The Locket

excerpt: A haunted mirror’s vengeful spirit terrorizes a southern Maryland family.
title: The Boogey Man

excerpt: A ruthless government agent invades a Northern California sanctuary city to eliminate the one obstacle to joining an elite white-supremacist society known as the Christmas Adventurers Club.
title: One Battle After Another

excerpt: A swordsman faces double-crosses and moral dilemmas on his quest for vengeance after discovering his father’s headless corpse.
title: Jade Tiger
